00032 void eol_entity_config()
00033 {
00034   /*TODO: load from config*/
00035   _eol_entity_max = 1024;
00036   _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawBounds;
00037   /*TODO support these draw modes*/
00038   switch(_eol_entity_draw_mode)
00039   {
00040     case eolEntityDrawBounds:
00041       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_box;
00042       break;
00043     case eolEntityDrawWireframe:
00044       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_wire;
00045       break;
00046     case eolEntityDrawMesh:
00047       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00048       break;
00049     case eolEntityDrawTextured:
00050       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00051       break;
00052     case eolEntityDrawLighting:
00053       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00054       break;
00055     case eolEntityDrawShaded:
00056       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00057       break;
00058   }
00059 }

00061 void eol_entity_init()
00062 {
00063   eol_logger_message(
00064       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00065       "eol_entity:initializing\n");
00066   _eol_entity_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00067     "eol_entity_manager",
00068     _eol_entity_max,
00069     sizeof(eolEntity)/* + _eol_entity_custom_data_size*/,
00070     eolTrue,
00071     eol_entity_delete,
00072     eol_entity_load_data_from_file
00073     );
00074   eol_logger_message(
00075       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00076       "eol_entity:initialized\n");
00077   atexit(eol_entity_close);
00078   _eol_entity_initialized = eolTrue;
00079 
00080 }

00082 void eol_entity_close()
00083 {
00084   eol_logger_message(
00085     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00086     "eol_entity:closing\n");
00087   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_entity_manager);
00088   _eol_entity_max = 0;
00089   _eol_entity_custom_data_size = 0;
00090   _eol_entity_custom_delete = NULL;
00091   _eol_entity_initialized = eolFalse;
00092   eol_logger_message(
00093     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00094     "eol_entity:closed\n");
00095 }

00097 void eol_entity_clear()
00098 {
00099   if (!eol_entity_initialized())
00100   {
00101     eol_logger_message(
00102       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00103       "eol_entity:cannot clear, not initialized\n");
00104     return;
00105   }
00106   if (!_eol_entity_manager)return;
00107   eol_resource_manager_clear(_eol_entity_manager);
00108 }

00120 void eol_entity_delete(void *entityData)
00121 {
00122   eolEntity *ent;
00123   GList *it = NULL;
00124   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00125   if (!entityData)return;
00126   ent = (eolEntity *)entityData;
00127   if ((ent->customData != NULL) &&
00128       (_eol_entity_custom_delete != NULL) &&
00129       (_eol_entity_custom_data_size != 0))
00130   {
00131     _eol_entity_custom_delete(ent->customData);
00132   }
00133   if (ent->children != NULL)
00134   {
00135     for (it = ent->children; it != NULL; it = it->next)
00136     {
00137       /*data should be pointing to an eolEntityPointer*/
00138       if (it->data != NULL)free(it->data);
00139     }
00140   }
00141   for (it = ent->actorList; it != NULL; it = it->next)
00142   {
00143     if (it->data)
00144     {
00145       eol_actor_free((eolActor**)&it->data);
00146     }
00147   }
00148   it = NULL;
00149   g_list_free(ent->actorList);
00150   ent->actor = NULL;
00151   ent->actorList = NULL;
00152   /*physics*/
00153   if (ent->body)cpBodyFree(ent->body);
00154   if (ent->shape)cpShapeFree(ent->shape);
00155   /*
00156   TODO: make this happen from the config
00157   eol_config_free(&ent->config);
00158   */
00159 }

00161 void eol_entity_free(eolEntity **ent)
00162 {
00163   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00164   eol_entity_remove_from_space(*ent);
00165   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_entity_manager,(void **)ent);
00166 }

00168 eolEntity *eol_entity_new()
00169 {
00170   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00171   if (!eol_entity_initialized())
00172   {
00173     eol_logger_message(
00174       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00175       "eol_entdow:used uninitialized\n");
00176     return NULL;
00177   }
00178   ent = (eolEntity *)eol_resource_new_element(_eol_entity_manager);
00179   if (ent == NULL)
00180   {
00181     eol_logger_message(
00182       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00183       "eol_entity:failed to get new resource\n");
00184     return NULL;
00185   }
00186   /*
00187   if (_eol_entity_custom_data_size > 0)
00188   {
00189     ent->customData = (void *)(ent + 1);
00190   }*/
00191   /*set some sane defaults:*/
00192   ent->self = ent;
00193   ent->collisionMask = CP_ALL_LAYERS;
00194   eol_orientation_clear(&ent->ori);
00195   ent->shown = eolTrue;
00196   ent->id = eol_resource_element_get_id(_eol_entity_manager,ent);
00197   return ent;
00198 }

00224 void eol_entity_postsync(eolEntity * ent)
00225 {
00226   cpVect p;
00227   if (!ent)return;
00228   /*sync with the physics body*/
00229   if (ent->body == NULL)return;
00230   p = cpBodyGetPos(ent->body);
00231   ent->ori.position.x = p.x;
00232   ent->ori.position.y = p.y;
00233   cpBodyEachArbiter(ent->body, (cpBodyArbiterIteratorFunc)eol_entity_handle_touch, ent);
00234 }
00235 
00236 void eol_entity_presync(eolEntity *ent)
00237 {
00238   if (!ent)return;
00239   eol_orientation_add(&ent->ori,
00240                       ent->ori,
00241                       ent->vector);
00242   eol_orientation_add(&ent->vector,
00243                       ent->vector,
00244                       ent->accel);
00245   if (ent->trackTrail)
00246   {
00247     eol_trail_append(&ent->trail,ent->ori);
00248   }
00249 
00250   if (ent->body != NULL)
00251   {
00252     cpBodySetPos(ent->body, cpv(ent->ori.position.x,ent->ori.position.y));
00253     cpBodySetVel(ent->body, cpv(ent->vector.position.x,ent->vector.position.y));
00254     cpBodyActivate(ent->body);
00255   }
00256 }

00258 void eol_entity_presync_all()
00259 {
00260   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00261   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00262   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00263   {
00264     eol_entity_presync(ent);
00265   }
00266 }

00268 void eol_entity_postsync_all()
00269 {
00270   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00271   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00272   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00273   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00274   {
00275     eol_entity_postsync(ent);
00276   }

00279 void eol_entity_update_all()
00280 {
00281   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00282   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00283   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00284   {

00291 
00292 void eol_entity_think_all()
00293 {
00294   eolUint now;
00295   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00296   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00297   now = eol_graphics_get_now();
00298   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00299   {
00300     if (ent->think != NULL)
00301     {
00302       if ((ent->thinkRate == -1) ||
00303           (ent->thinkNext > now))
00304       {
00305         ent->think(ent);
00306         if (ent->thinkRate != -1)
00307         {
00308           ent->thinkNext += ent->thinkRate;
00309         }
00310       }
00311     }
00312   }
00313 }

00315 void eol_entity_draw_box(eolEntity *ent)
00316 {
00317   eolRectFloat rect;
00318   eolOrientation ori;
00319   if (!ent)return;
00320   switch (ent->shapeType)
00321   {
00322     case eolEntityRect:
00323       rect.x = ent->boundingBox.w* -0.5;
00324       rect.y = ent->boundingBox.h* -0.5;
00325       rect.w = ent->boundingBox.w;
00326       rect.h = ent->boundingBox.h;
00327       eol_orientation_copy(&ori,ent->ori);
00328       eol_vector_clear_3D(ori.rotation);
00329       eol_draw_rect_3D(rect, ori);
00330       break;
00331     case eolEntityCircle:
00332       eol_draw_cirlce_3D(ent->ori.position,
00333                         ent->radius,
00334                         32,
00335                         ent->ori.color,
00336                         ent->ori.alpha);
00337       break;
00338     default:
00339       eol_draw_dot_3D(ent->ori.position,
00340                       ent->radius,
00341                       ent->ori.color,
00342                       ent->ori.alpha);
00343   }
00344 }

00346 void eol_entity_draw_wire(eolEntity *ent)
00347 {
00348   GList *list;
00349   if (!ent)return;
00350   for (list = ent->actorList;list != NULL;list = list->next)
00351   {
00352     if (list->data != NULL)
00353     {
00354       eol_actor_draw_wire((eolActor *)list->data,
00355                      ent->ori.position,
00356                      ent->ori.rotation,
00357                      ent->ori.scale,
00358                      ent->ori.color,
00359                      ent->ori.alpha);
00360     }
00361   }
00362 }

00382 void eol_entity_draw(eolEntity *ent)
00383 {
00384   if (!ent)return;
00385   if (ent->shown == eolFalse)
00386   {
00387     fprintf(stdout,"skipping draw re: not shown\n");
00388     return;
00389   }
00390   /*NOTE: may end up drawing other effects...*/
00391   if (ent->ori.alpha == 0.0f)
00392   {
00393     fprintf(stdout,"skipping draw re: 0 alpha\n");
00394     return;
00395   }
00396   if (_eol_entity_draw_func != NULL)
00397   {
00398     _eol_entity_draw_func(ent);
00399   }
00400   else
00401   {
00402     eol_entity_draw_textured(ent);
00403   }
00404 }
00405 
00406 void eol_entity_draw_all()
00407 {
00408   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00409   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00410   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00411   {
00412     eol_entity_draw(ent);
00413   }
00414 }

00417 /*physics sync*/
00418 static void eol_entity_handle_touch(cpBody *body, cpArbiter *arbiter, void *data)
00419 {
00420   eolEntity *self = (eolEntity *)data;
00421   eolEntity *other = NULL;
00422   cpBody *a,*b;
00423   if (self == NULL)
00424   {
00425     eol_logger_message(
00426       EOL_LOG_ERROR,"Given bad pointer to self in HandleEntityTouch.\n");
00427     return;
00428   }
00429   if (self->touch == NULL)
00430   {
00431     /*no need to do any more work here*/
00432     return;
00433   }
00434   cpArbiterGetBodies(arbiter, &a, &b);
00435   if ((a == NULL)||(b == NULL))
00436   {
00437     eol_logger_message(
00438       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00439       "Arbiter returned bad participants!\n");
00440     return;
00441   }
00442   if (a->data == (void *)self)
00443   {
00444     if (b->data == NULL)
00445     {
00446       return;
00447     }
00448     other = (eolEntity *)b->data;
00449   }
00450   else if (b->data == self)
00451   {
00452     if (a->data == NULL)
00453     {
00454       return;
00455     }
00456     other = (eolEntity *)a->data;
00457   }
00458   else
00459   {
00460     eol_logger_message(
00461       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00462       "neither body attached to this arbiter is self!\n");
00463     return;
00464   }
00465   self->touch(self,other);
00466 }

00468 /*space stuff*/
00469 void eol_entity_add_to_space(eolEntity *ent,cpSpace *space)
00470 {
00471   if ((!ent) || (!space))
00472   {
00473     eol_logger_message(
00474       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00475       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to add_to_space.\n");
00476     return;
00477   }
00478   if (ent->body == NULL)
00479   {
00480     eol_logger_message(
00481       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00482       "eol_entity:cannot add a NULL body to a space for entity %s.\n",
00483       ent->name);
00484     return;
00485   }
00486   if (ent->shape == NULL)
00487   {
00488     eol_logger_message(
00489       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00490       "eol_entity:cannot add a NULL shape to a space for entity %s.\n",
00491       ent->name);
00492     return;
00493   }
00494   if (cpSpaceAddBody(space, ent->body) == NULL)
00495   {
00496     eol_logger_message(
00497       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00498       "eol_entity:failed to add body to a space for entity %s.\n",
00499       ent->name);
00500     return;
00501   }
00502   if (cpSpaceAddShape(space, ent->shape) == NULL)
00503   {
00504     eol_logger_message(
00505       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00506       "eol_entity:failed to add shape to a space for entity %s.\n",
00507       ent->name);
00508     return;
00509   }
00510   ent->_space = space;
00511 }
00512 
00513 void eol_entity_remove_from_space(eolEntity *ent)
00514 {
00515   if (!ent)
00516   {
00517     eol_logger_message(
00518       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00519       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to remove_from_space.\n");
00520     return;
00521   }
00522   if (ent->_space == NULL)
00523   {
00524     return;
00525   }
00526   if (ent->body == NULL)
00527   {
00528     eol_logger_message(
00529       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00530       "eol_entity:entity does not have a body!\n");
00531     return;
00532   }
00533   cpSpaceRemoveShape(ent->_space, ent->shape);
00534   cpSpaceRemoveBody(ent->_space, ent->body);
00535 }
00536 
00537 void eol_entity_shape_make_circle(eolEntity *ent)
00538 {
00539   if (!ent)
00540   {
00541     eol_logger_message(
00542       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00543       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to shape make circle.\n");
00544     return;
00545   }
00546   eol_entity_remove_from_space(ent);
00547   if (ent->shape != NULL)
00548   {
00549     cpShapeFree(ent->shape);
00550   }
00551   if (ent->body == NULL)
00552   {
00553     ent->body = cpBodyNew(ent->mass, INFINITY);
00554     if (ent->body == NULL)
00555     {
00556       eol_logger_message(
00557       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00558       "eol_entity:failed to create a new body for physics entity.\n");
00559       return;
00560     }
00561   }
00562   ent->shapeType = eolEntityCircle;
00563   ent->shape = cpCircleShapeNew(ent->body, ent->radius, cpvzero);
00564   cpShapeSetLayers(ent->shape, ent->collisionMask);
00565 }
00566 
00567 void eol_entity_shape_make_rect(eolEntity *ent)
00568 {
00569   if (!ent)
00570   {
00571     eol_logger_message(
00572       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00573       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to shape make circle.\n");
00574     return;
00575   }
00576   eol_entity_remove_from_space(ent);
00577   if (ent->body == NULL)
00578   {
00579     ent->body = cpBodyNew(ent->mass, INFINITY);
00580     if (ent->body == NULL)
00581     {
00582       eol_logger_message(
00583         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00584         "eol_entity:failed to create a new body for physics entity.\n");
00585       return;
00586     }
00587   }
00588   if (ent->shape != NULL)
00589   {
00590     cpShapeFree(ent->shape);
00591   }
00592   ent->shapeType = eolEntityRect;
00593   ent->shape = cpBoxShapeNew(ent->body, ent->boundingBox.w, ent->boundingBox.h);
00594   cpShapeSetLayers(ent->shape, ent->collisionMask);
00595 }

00610 void eol_entity_remove_entity_from_collision_mask(eolEntity *ent,cpLayers collisionmask)

00613   ent->collisionMask = ent->collisionMask & ~collisionmask;

00616 /*entity data*/
00617 void eol_entity_add_actor(eolEntity *ent,eolActor *act)
00618 {
00619   if ((!ent)||(!act))return;
00620   ent->actorList = g_list_append(ent->actorList,act);
00621   if (ent->actor == NULL)
00622   {
00623     ent->actor = act;
